General.Name: Aekyung Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Aekyung Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of household and beauty products in South Korea. It provides beauty care products, including hair and body care products, and cosmetics; health care products, such as dental care and health products; and home care products comprising laundry detergents, dishwashing detergents, and others. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
